Detailed Description

This class (CSearchDialogScope) provides the graphical user interface for the scope part of the searchdialog.

It provides an easy to use interface with the following functions:

-Possibility to define mltiple scopes for each module -Possibilty to define wheter we want to use no scope, the result of the last search as scope or an own set of ranges

The BibleTime team
